means: 翘起拇指请求搭乘（过路汽车），示意请求搭便车（thumb的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: He thumbed through a couple of pages, feigning just a slight interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 他随手翻了几页，假装兴趣不大。

sentence.Network_en: He has always thumbed his nose at the media.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对媒体一直都嗤之以鼻。
那些书因被翻阅过多而弄得很脏.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he took it down and busily thumbed it through ., 他把它拿下来 , 匆忙地翻查了一遍.
we thumbed a lift to london for the weekend ., 我们免费搭车去伦敦度周末.
Thus the enthusiastic dumb man thumbed the humble man ' s umbrella ., 于是热情的哑巴用拇指拨弄谦卑男子的伞.
Dee broke off a piece of limestone and thumbed it into the stream ., 迪伊掰下一块石灰石 , 用拇指弹进河里.

list.abs: 这也是“绿姆指”(Green Thumb)的位置，代表你需要他人的刺激，才能展开新计画，但一旦计画开始之后，又会步伐踏实，保持坚忍的 …
初中英语总复习_百度知道 ... all there 神志清醒的;没有问题的 all thumbs 笨手笨脚的;一窍不通的 all turn out 如愿以偿.
美剧常用俚语 - 豆丁网 ... all ears 全是耳朵（洗耳恭听） all thumbs 满手都是大拇指（笨手笨脚） an ace up my sleeve 袖里的王牌.
机械英语词汇|各类常用英语词汇 ... inner parts inspect 内部检查 thumb screw 大头螺丝 lbs. inch 镑、英寸.
进出口行业词汇英语翻译(T) ... thumb pin 图钉 thumb screw 翼形螺钉 thumb tack 图钉.
thumb nut 蝶形螺母thumb pin 图钉thumb rule 经验法则

entry.def: Your thumb is the short thick part on the side of your hand next to your four fingers.

example.ex: She bit the tip of her left thumb, not looking at me.
example.tran: 她咬着左手的拇指尖，眼睛也不看我。

entry.def: The thumb of a glove is the part which a person's thumb fits into.

entry.tran: (站在路边，伸出手，拇指向上)请求搭便车，拦车
entry.def: If you thumb a lift or thumb a ride, you stand by the side of the road holding out your thumb until a driver stops and gives you a lift.

example.ex: It may interest you to know that a boy answering Rory's description thumbed a ride to Howth...
example.tran: 你或许会对这个消息感兴趣，有个和罗里描述的一模一样的小男孩搭便车到了霍斯。

example.ex: Thumbing a lift had once a carefree, easy-going image.
example.tran: 伸手搭便车曾经给人以轻松随意的形象。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something sticks out like a sore thumb or stands out like a sore thumb, you are emphasizing that they are very noticeable, usually because they are unusual or inappropriate.

example.ex: Does the new housing stick out like a sore thumb or blend into its surroundings?...
example.tran: 这个新住宅区是显得有点扎眼，还是和环境融为一体？

example.ex: In Japan a European stands out like a sore thumb.
example.tran: 欧洲人到了日本会极为惹眼。

entry.def: If you say that someone is twiddling their thumbs, you mean that they do not have anything to do and are waiting for something to happen.

example.ex: The prospect of waiting around just twiddling his thumbs was appalling...
example.tran: 想到将要无所事事，他就非常害怕。

example.ex: The Government cannot expect graduates to twiddle their thumbs on the dole.
example.tran: 政府不愿意看到毕业生领着救济金却什么也不干。

entry.def: If you are under someone's thumb, you are under their control, or very heavily influenced by them.

example.ex: I cannot tell you what pain I feel when I see how much my mother is under my father's thumb...
example.tran: 看见我母亲完完全全受我父亲的控制，我心里别提有多难受。

example.ex: She has Rachel firmly under her thumb.
example.tran: 她把雷切尔牢牢地抓在手心里。

means.word_mean: 1. (of pages) worn or soiled by thumb and fingers by frequent handling or turning;

auth_sentence.res_content: Ang thumbed her nose at him and stuck out her tongue.

auth_sentence.content: He grabbed his phone and thumbed out an update to Twitter.
auth_sentence.res_content: He grabbed his phone and thumbed out an update to Twitter.
